name: Rainbow Jewel Diamond Quest
description:
Hop in your panda and embark on new magical adventures! Whip your way through fantastical jewel islands and rescue a jewel fairy from the witches! Earn rewards along the way to challenge tons of levels! With thousands of levels and challenging game modes, and daily events, Jewel Panda Quest provides endless hours of fun and exciting match 3 puzzle gameplay!

FEATURES
◆Swap, match, and crush jewels in thousands of fun and challenging match-3 puzzle levels
◆Brand new power-ups and ways to play!
◆Swap and blast your way through ever expanding new worlds!
◆Check back often for events, free rewards and new levels!
◆Collect keys to unlock new worlds and crush challenges!
